file_content.text: Think you've won, don't you? Hmph.
Be reasonable, Duke. Your calls for peace are misguided, unnecessary.
Lord Nefarid wants what's best for House Thul: unconditional victory.
And all he asks is that I betray Organa... who the skies are you?
I'm the Jedi who's here to rescue you from Aleyna.
A friend.
You invaded my home. How many guards did you kill getting inside?
All of them--and now she means to kill you.
All of them--and now he's going to kill you.
That woman isn't your ally. She's marking you for death.
Your life is in danger.
Marking me? I don't understand.
It's a trick. Organa sent her to kill you.
It's a trick. Organa sent him to kill you.
Get out of my way. I need to kill that assassin next to you.
Aleyna's worst nightmare.
Assassin? What are you talking about?
Don't listen to her. She wants to confuse you.
Ignore him. He's trying to confuse you.
Be warned... I am prepared to kill you. Lord Nefarid trained me to fight a Jedi.
What about two Jedi?
Jedi + T7 = double threat!
Guards! Defend the duke!
Be careful out there. My life is in your hands.
Here are the coordinates to the research facility--what's left of it. I hope you find something useful. Take care, Master Jedi.
That was the Death Mark laser. It killed Count Alde.
Happened so fast, I never felt the danger....
Attack trajectory = untraceable // Odds of locating laser = zero
Have to get out of here. It's not safe. We're all going to die!
The count... you there, hands up! Men, take their weapons. Lock down this building!
We didn't kill him. We're here to help.
Take it easy. We're friends.
The count was killed by a long-range laser, not a lightsaber.
You're accusing me?
You can explain after you surrender.
I need to find the count's killer. Anyone who gets in my way will regret it.
Don't try to stop me.
Men--lethal force authorized.
Back against the wall and put your hands up. This is your final warning!
Are you insane? She's a Jedi Knight! We had nothing to do with this.
Are you insane? He's a Jedi Knight! We had nothing to do with this.
We'll verify your identities and alibis. If what you say is true, you'll be released.
Long-range communications have been restored. Should only take a few days to sort this out.
Long-range communications are down. May take weeks to sort this out, but I promise you fair treatment.
There's a Sith trying to destroy Alderaan. I have to stop him.
We can't afford the delay.
Please, let the Jedi go. You... you can arrest me. Will that be enough?
If you are a Jedi, we obviously can't stop you from leaving....
I'll release you on your own recognizance. This woman will remain in a secure area until you return.
I appreciate your understanding.
Thank you, Captain.
"Understanding"... that's one word for it.
I need her knowledge to complete my mission. She's coming with me.
Release her, too.
I'm safer here. You can reach me by holo, if necessary.
We've been more than fair. Don't push us.
You made the right choice. The alternative would've been unpleasant.
Smart move.
I'm aware of that.
Don't make me regret this.
Lives are in danger. You'll do anything to help me save Alderaan.
[Force Persuade] Let me go.
Lives are in danger. I'll do anything to help you save Alderaan.
You look under-equipped. Here, take some of my gear....
Men, secure the building. I'll contact Organa security and inform them of the situation.
You've got to find the Death Mark before that Sith kills again.
I don't have time for this. Out of my way!
Stand aside, or else! [Attack]
That's it--take her down!
That's it--take him down!
Please, stop fighting. You... you can lock me up. Just let the Jedi go.
I'll probably lose my commission over this, but... very well.
You should speak to the count.
No one on Alderaan is safe. Anyone could be a target.
